name: Bane
description: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make Charisma saving throws. Whenever a target that fails this saving throw makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.
higherLevelsDescription: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

effects.special: Targets subtract 1d4 from Attack Rolls and Saving Throws.

engineHook.notes: Requires logic to apply a negative modifier die to d20 tests.
